title: Strategic Partnership Between Scytl and Swiss Post Enables Increased Online Voting Use by Swiss Citizens
text:
As part of the initiative to significantly increase the percentage of Swiss citizens allowed to leverage the online channel for elections and consultations, Scytl and Swiss Post launch their strategic partnership providing end-to-end security and full verifiability to all Swiss cantons wishing to leverage their joint technology.
Barcelona & Bern (PRWEB UK) 1 September 2015
Scytl, the worldwide leader in secure online voting and election modernization, today announced its strategic partnership with Swiss Post to provide Swiss Cantons with the most advanced online voting solution with end-to-end security and full verifiability.
The partnership and joint solution provided by Scytl and Swiss Post will meet the strict Federal Chancellery requirements that enable Cantons who wish to grow the percentage of citizens that can use the online channel for both binding elections and citizen consultations. In the updated system, security and verifiability protocols have been customized by Scytl and Swiss Post to meet Swiss legal, security and verifiability requirements that will enable Swiss Cantons to implement online voting solutions with:
 End to end security: the industry leading security protocols ensure authentication, vote and voter privacy (ensuring individual vote contents are never known to the system), vote integrity and authenticity via digital certificates, encrypting votes on the voter’s device, cryptographic mixnets & secret sharing, voter digital signatures and immutable logs. Full verifiability: the sophisticated protocols and control components provide individual and universal verifiability ensuring voters and auditors alike can verify that votes have been cast-as-intended, recorded-as-cast and counted as-recorded and the audit of public source code.
With the launch of the partnership, Swiss Post will be the sole provider of Scytl’s end-to-end and fully verifiable platform in Switzerland. “We are thrilled to see Scytl’s 10 years’ experience in Switzerland going to the next level with Swiss Post. Working with Swiss Post – an organization globally reputed for its innovation and quality IT implementations – will prove a win-win for both our organizations, but most importantly for the citizens of all Swiss Cantons,” says Klaus Thalmann, General Manager for Europe at Scytl.
As recently announced, Neuchâtel will be the first canton to leverage the joint solution. The current online voting platform has been updated to comply with the updated Swiss Federal Chancellery requirements for full verifiability and will make it the most advanced online voting solution deployed in Switzerland, taking the canton one step closer to 100% potential citizen online channel leverage.
About Scytl
Scytl is the global leader in secure election management, electronic voting and eGovernance solutions. Specializing in election modernization technologies, Scytl offers the first end-to-end election management and voting platform, providing the highest security and transparency standards currently available. Scytl has capitalized on its more than 18 years of research to develop election-specific cryptographic security technology protected by more than 40 international patents and patent applications, positioning Scytl as the company with the largest patent portfolio of the industry.
Scytl’s solutions have been successfully used in over 38 countries across the globe over the last 10 years, including Canada, the United States, Mexico, Ecuador, France, Norway, Switzerland, Bosnia-Herzegovina, the UAE, India, Iceland and Australia. Scytl is headquartered in Barcelona, Spain, with strategic offices in the United States, Canada, Brazil, Peru and Greece, as well as field offices in the UK, Ukraine, Mexico, Malaysia, India, Bangladesh and Australia. For more information, visit http://www.scytl.com .
